title: Loving Blake
description: When quirky, handsome, legal aid attorney, Benjamin Dalton, literally trips over the woman of his dreams...his life changes forever. Blake Redwood, CEO of La Rouge Cosmetics, is not too enthusiastic about being the recipient of his clumsiness, but him stumbling into her life ignites a passion neither of them can deny. So when murderous ex-lovers, seductive coworkers, and sabotaged sex toys threaten their relationship will Benjamin be able to continue on.... Loving Blake?
author: T.N. Jones
